name: Bells Canyon Trail
description: Scenic hiking trail in the Wasatch Mountains offering stunning views, waterfalls and well‑maintained paths.

name: Dimple Dell Regional Park
description: Expansive park with walking and horse riding trails, picnic areas, nature center and open green spaces.

name: Sandy Amphitheater
description: Outdoor concert venue with mountain views, shaded seating and community events throughout the summer.

name: Hale Centre Theatre
description: Professional live theatre at the Mountain America Performing Arts Centre, hosting musicals and plays year‑round.

name: Shops at South Town
description: Large regional shopping mall with 150 stores, entertainment, dining, an indoor climbing gym and a cinema.

name: Historic Sandy Station
description: Light rail TRAX station serving Sandy, adjacent to the Sandy Railtrail and park‑and‑ride facilities.

name: John & Mary Mattson House
description: Well‑preserved Victorian home built circa 1910, listed on the National Register of Historic Places.

name: American West Symphony
description: Local symphony orchestra offering concerts in Sandy and Salt Lake Valley, enriching cultural life in the community.
